description: Top-class everyday shoe made from high-quality smooth leather in a sporty-casual design. The Michelin sole provides excellent grip on both rocks and asphalt. Excellent cushioning thanks to the Strobel construction. All-around protection with a TPU heel support and a rubber cap to protect the toes. Hueco Advanced Low LTH Men, combining everyday and approach, high-quality materials, a comfortable fit and modern design.
name: Mammut Hueco Advanced Low - Mens
